content.question: Which of the following best describes the difference between the total amount of <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> produced by adults compared to juveniles at the start of the <math alttext="32 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>32</mn><mi>Â°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> trial?

choices.label: Adult corals produced <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>3</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> times more <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> than juveniles produced.

Adult corals produced <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>3</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> times less <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> than juveniles produced.

Adult corals produced <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>5</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> times more <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> than juveniles produced.

Adult corals produced <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>5</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> times less <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> than juveniles produced.

content.answer: Adult corals produced <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>5</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> times more <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> than juveniles produced.

skill.text: 5.A: Perform mathematical calculations, including: i. mathematical equations in the curriculum ii. means iii. rates iv. ratios v. percentages and percent changes
